document.full_text: fighting between antigovernment protesters and security forces resulted in four people reportedly killed, even as president ali abdullah saleh promised that he would not use violence against the demonstrators.
document.title: in yemeni capital, security forces attack protest encampment
lines_and_colors: fighting between antigovernment protesters and security forces resulted in four people reportedly killed, even as president ali abdullah saleh promised that he would not use violence against the demonstrators.
